feels.name: Disdain
feels.quote: Elizabeth would not, for the mere purpose of obliging Lady Catherine, have answered this question.

feels.name: Resentment
feels.quote: You have insulted me, in every possible method.

feels.name: Defiance
feels.quote: I shall now know how to act. Do not imagine, Miss Bennet, that your ambition will ever be gratified.

causedBy.name: Elizabeth's refusal to promise not to marry Mr. Darcy

feels.name: Discomfort
feels.quote: The discomposure of spirits which this extraordinary visit threw Elizabeth into could not be easily overcome.

feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: Miss Bennet, I insist on being satisfied.

causedBy.name: Elizabeth's refusal to promise never to enter into an engagement with Mr. Darcy
Elizabeth's refusal to promise never to enter into an engagement with Mr. Darcy

Places.name: Longbourn dining-room
Places.description: The main dining area in the Bennet household.

Events.name: Elizabeth's refusal to promise not to marry Mr. Darcy
